title: Double chocolate mousse entremets
description: A little precision and a little effort is required to make these amazing chocolate mousse-filled cakes. But don’t let Mary hear you complain.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a pastry comb, a 33x23cm/13x9in Swiss roll tin, 6 x 6.5cm/2½in chefs’ rings, a roll of baking silicone and a piping bag fitted with a plain 2cm/1½in nozzle.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz fresh berries (raspberries and blueberries work well)
